alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:27AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Cowley and Chautauqua Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 427 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Winfield to Cedar Vale to 6 miles northeast of Bigheart. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sedan, Cedar Vale, Burden, Dexter, Peru, Chautauqua, Elgin, Niotaze, Hale and Maple City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for south central and southeastern Kansas.
